item.noNoteSubText: Notes that get created in your conversation automatically show up here.
item.noEventSubText: Events on your calendar will automatically show up here.

notificationsForBrowser.label: Desktop notifications for browser

directMessages.label: Direct messages

mentions.description: Receive email notifications for when you are mentioned

teams.description: Receive email notifications for team messages

dailyDigest.description: Receive Glip daily digest emails summarizing daily tasks and team events

extensions.description: Customize your RingCentral extension settings (call routing, voicemail greetings and more)

regionSetting.label: Region
regionSetting.regionChangeDesc: Set the country and area code for your region. This will be used for local and emergency dialing and phone number formatting.

ringerSource.label: Ringer source
